semantics.label: translate:: Image Multiple Hotspot Question Editor

fields.label: translate:: The title of this question
fields.description: translate:: Used in summaries, statistics etc.

fields.label: translate:: Background image
fields.description: translate:: Select an image to use as background the image hotspot question.

fields.label: translate:: Hotspots
fields.description: translate:: Choose appropriate figure for your hotspot, configure it, then drag and resize it into place.

fields.label: translate:: Hotspot Name
fields.description: translate:: Please enter what the user is trying to find i.e. risks, objects, errors (this will be used in feedback statements).

fields.label: translate:: Number of correct hotspots that need to be found for question completion
fields.description: translate:: If left blank, will default to the number of correct hotspots created.

fields.label: translate:: Correct
fields.description: translate:: There can be multiple correct hotspots. The user gets correct/incorrect feedback immediately after each click. The feedback will be displayed in the form of - (Text entered below) (Number of hotspots found) of (Correct hotspots needed) (Hotspot Name entered above).

fields.label: translate:: Feedback if the user selects an empty spot:
fields.placeholder: translate:: You didn't locate any hotspots, try again!

fields.label: translate:: Feedback if the user selects an already found hotspot:
fields.placeholder: translate:: You have already found this one!
